scripts.prepackage: npm run build:dependencies && npm run build
scripts.package: rm -rf produles && mono-install --engine pnpm --install-dir produles --package-json ./package.json --package-lock ../../pnpm-lock.yaml --resolve -- --frozen-lockfile=false --prod && npm run zip
scripts.zip: cd produles && mkdir nodejs && mv node_modules nodejs/node_modules && zip -9 -r --symlinks --quiet nodejs.zip nodejs
